title: ambaa sutha gaNapathE
sahitya:
ambA suta gaNapatE shrI
ghambIra vANi priya guNanidhE
(amba)


anupallavi

lambOdara shrI lakshmi kara
ambOruha caraNa pankEruha naLina
(amba)
               

caraNam

siddhi vinAyaka bhakti pradAyaka mUshika vAhana mOdhakara
(sat) bhAvasthita bhava pAshAnkusakara pAvana jana paripAla kripAkara
(amba)
